review_blob:
As a beginner I have a hard time to describe it. The brewery played with a lot of carbonization. It is interesting. It is very interesting but nothing I would order a second one. 
Very nice bitterness and aftertaste. For me the carbonization is too strong for the rather flat aroma and taste of this beer.
beer_name: Blek Pine Sofia Metal Fest IPA

review_blob: Tasted this beer at vitaminB. Nice aroma of mango. The bitterness is well balanced while taste could be stronger. But as it is the first craft beer I had in Bulgaria I like the overall impression.
Very intensive coffee and dark chocolate! Creamy. Tastes stronger in alcohol than it is.

I thought it would be more rebellious. 
But fine IPA with a splendid fruity aroma. 
Crisp. Fresh. But not wild in any case.
